question: i am 16 and i went to the doctor to get get tested for PCOS and diabetes..i read that yellowish skin was a symptom of these..while there i mentioned the yellow skin around my neck,under my armpits and between my legs..i got full blood tests and my doctor said there was no action needed..so my question is is there any other causes for this and how do i get rid of it...thankyou
title: Skin DIscolouration
